1127600.name: Starpoint Gemini 3 - Supporter Pack
1127600.description:
SUPPORTER PACK CONTENT
  • Get your hands on the original complete soundtrack goodness from Starpoint Gemini 3, composed by the very talented Nikola Nikita Jeremic (.flac and .mp3 formats)
  • Starpoint Gemini 3 official artbook. Over 50 pages of digital artsy treats!
  • Four special in-game weapons to make your stay in Gemini more pleasant

*The Artbook is only available in English!
*The items contained in the Supporter Pack can be found in the Starpoint Gemini 3 installation folder\DLC\Dlc0
*The Supporter Pack will be updated during Early Access to include more in-game items and additions at no extra charge
1127600.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 日语, 简体中文, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 土耳其语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
*具有完全音频支持的语言
